review.description: Scotty's is my new favorite alternative to driving all the way to Soulard. With fantastic prices and a good selection, I'll be a regular customer! Anyone in the area should check it out. Plus, their plant/garden selection is beautiful. Great friendly service, and I CAN'T WAIT for the deli to open at the end of the month. Everyone should just give it a chance, I think you'll be surprised, in a good way!
review.author: Careth T.
